mapper.select: SELECT c.created_date , c.chit_title , i.acct_id , getVdrName(c.vdr_code) as vdrCode , c.tot_price , c.tax_code , getSubCode(c.status) as status , getSubCode(c.type) as type , getDeptName(c.dept_code) as deptCode , getEmpName(c.phy_emp_id) as phyEmpId , getEmpName(c.appr_emp_id) as apprEmpId , c.note , i.type as itype , i.price as iprice FROM chit c LEFT JOIN indignation i ON c.chit_code = i.chit_code
